title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Create a backup of your flight and flightplans
description:
In this video we will have a look at the option to store both the flight plan as well as flights on the Xbox cloud storage. This is a handy option if your playing on multiple devices or your would like to have a backup in case your PC crashes.
